content:
Subject: Top Position - Boost Your Local Market with SEO and Google Ads

Hey [Prospect's Name],

[Your Name] here from Top Position. Ready to elevate your business and own your local market with powerful SEO and Google Ads, even if you think you have enough business?

(Allow them to respond.)

Common Objections and Smart Responses:

1. Objection: "I'm too busy."
Response: I understand, but that's why we're here - to streamline your success without adding to your workload. Let's take 15 minutes to explore opportunities for driving more business.
2. Objection: "We already have enough business."
Response: That's great! But let's capitalize on your success and ensure long-term stability. Optimize your SEO and Google Ads to stay ahead of the competition and secure your future.
3. Objection: "We've tried online marketing before, and it didn't work."
Response: It's time for a fresh approach. Our tailored strategies and proven track record deliver real results. Let's talk about how we can elevate your business.
4. Objection: "I don't understand SEO and Google Ads."
Response: No worries! Our team of experts will handle everything and guide you to success. We're here to empower you and make sure you're informed every step of the way.
5. Objection: "It's too expensive."
Response: Investing in SEO and Google Ads is investing in your growth. Our services provide a strong return, driving more leads and revenue. We'll create a plan that fits your budget and delivers results.

If they're interested in learning more:

Great! Let's discuss our services. I have two time slots for a 15-minute call tomorrow: [Proposed Time A] and [Proposed Time B]. Which one works for you?

(If they say no or not interested:)

No worries. Remember, when you're ready to elevate your business, we'll be here. Have an amazing day!

(End the call)

Personalize the script by researching the prospect's business before the call and adjust your approach based on their responses.
